website_summaries.verdict: Though it has its limitations, this single-piece hair extension provides an easy way to effortlessly create a totally different do.
pros: Generates enthusiasm for providing a fun way to change looks without cutting your hair, as the one-piece design attaches easily with clips to create bangs
Soft, synthetic fibers are easy to style
cons: Not for anyone who wants to add length

customer_reviews.title: Cute, cute, cute
customer_reviews.text: I'm going through chemo and there are days I just don't want to wear a wig, so I pin this into a knit hat or ball cap and it frames my face nicely. Often I will attach a ponytail inside a knit cap as well and it looks very natural. I've bought the bangs in auburn and blonde and really like them both. Wish they made one that had Velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Judy S.

customer_reviews.title: Goes paper straight and will not style.
customer_reviews.text: They are very blunt. But i'm pretty good at fixing that myself. The biggest problem I found with these as soon as you apply heat, they go paper straight and there is nothing you can do to curl them under to frame your face. It makes them look aweful and fake. I really wanted to like these because the color was perfect for my auburn hair.
customer_reviews.author: Ashta

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color match
customer_reviews.text: The color is a 98% match for my copper colored hair!! Good quality. I sent a picture to my sister and she thought I had really cut my hair. I bought this for my Halloween costume and I am super pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: Bangs are alittle too short and too straight
customer_reviews.text: The bang hairpiece looks and feels like human hair, it's made well, and the color matched my own hair perfectly... The reason I only gave it a three rating was the bangs are cut a little too short and are really too straight... Going to see if I can style it so I can wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Dmvg

customer_reviews.title: Def worth it
customer_reviews.text: Okay with this price I had ZERO expectations- I’m a natural redhead so the chances of it matching my hair were very slim - ITS PERFECT
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Just eh
customer_reviews.text: Bangs are way too thick and blunt, it's hard to blend them into natural hair
customer_reviews.author: lululec

customer_reviews.title: Color
customer_reviews.text: The color was a very Dark auburn color, not at all like the pictures from seller or customers
customer_reviews.author: MBC

customer_reviews.title: Not so good...
customer_reviews.text: When I first got it it was very good. Then I tried to put a little more curl in the for Halloween to be “Peggy” it went flat
customer_reviews.author: Traci Langenbach

customer_reviews.title: despite what the pics look like. And it is very long
customer_reviews.text: This is a very light, true red, not strawberry blonde or auburn, despite what the pics look like. And it is very long. If you want your bangs to start in the middle of your head, you're fine, otherwise, trim them. But they're well made, and convinced me that I sure would look good with bangs.
customer_reviews.author: PPK

customer_reviews.title: Bangs looked nice in a virtual make-over (online)
customer_reviews.text: I bought these just to see if bangs would be flattering on me. Bangs looked nice in a virtual make-over (online), but I knew that getting a haircut would involve commitment to maintain the style. So, I wanted to be absolutely sure. These clip-in bangs worked great. Some people could barely tell they were fake. Others asked if I was wearing a wig. So, not everyone was fooled, but everybody thought they were cute. I am a natural redhead, or natural copper-blonde depending on who you ask.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lyons

customer_reviews.title: Soft and shiny
customer_reviews.text: Looks as show in picture. Purchased the red one and the color it as advertised. Quality of hair is nice- soft and shiny. Bangs are full and long pieces on either side
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: This is great.
customer_reviews.text: This is so great, it matched so well. Really well made. You must try this!
customer_reviews.author: lorna young

customer_reviews.title: good color
customer_reviews.text: thank you for the color it is hard to find
customer_reviews.author: Fran R.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how well made this was! It clips into your hair easily and stays in place very well! I ran, jumped, danced with this, and it stayed on. It was comfortable and hardly noticeable. There are two comb clips that snap into your existing hair, and stay until you snap them out. This red was fairly close to my copper red, and different color of the bangs is not nearly as evident in person as it is in the pictures. Several friends thought I had actually cut bangs! This is a really fun product. I went with a group as Doctor Who companions, and these were the perfect bangs for Donna Noble!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: you can tell it's fake, but for the price it works.
customer_reviews.author: Crysannia

customer_reviews.title: Save this for Halloween!
customer_reviews.text: Great clip in - unfortunately the color is unbelievable. Find one that matches your hair exactly. Good for Halloween fun!
customer_reviews.author: A Fabulous Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Im a natural red head and was worried if it would match and it was perfect
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Not true to color
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the auburn and it's more of an light ash brown. Not even close to the photo. Good thing I didn't spend a lot on it.
customer_reviews.author: Testarossa

customer_reviews.title: Looks real blends well
customer_reviews.text: I liked color choice. My hair is thinning on one sire this filled in perfectly !!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Mount

customer_reviews.title: Much browner than what was pictured..
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, shipping was timely, but was much browner than the picture. Doesn't match my hair at all. And it's all one solid color, no varied tones like the pic. Looks fake.
customer_reviews.author: Rev

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Almost a perfect color match
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Almost a perfect color match... The only down side is they are a little thick so they make me look like I have a bowl cut.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Way too phony even after tailoring it to me. I tossed it.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I only wish I would have ordered it a shade darker. These are cute, shiny, not too thick, easy to clip on. Very natural looking. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonuser

customer_reviews.title: Super fast shipping and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: i bought these and it arrived super quickly and the product overall is just great. I am in love with this
customer_reviews.author: Dalia Casil

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not a good match at all, thick and shiny though
customer_reviews.author: karenruth

customer_reviews.title: ... prise color match ok lil heavyhad to thin very fun easy way to change ur look
customer_reviews.text: gud ror prise color match ok lil heavyhad to thin very fun easy way to change ur look
customer_reviews.author: karen garcia

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does not blend well--there's a large bump and also too heavy for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Redhead problems
customer_reviews.text: As a natural redhead, it’s super hard to find hair that matches my hair color without spending a lot of money to color match, so I’m not super upset that this didn’t match my hair completely. It’s a nice wig, however the bangs are THICK, so I had to do a lot of trimming and shaving away excess hair. Overall, I’m happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Adeline

product_meta.title: S-noilite Charming 8"(20cm) Front Neat Light Auburn Bangs/fringe Clip in Hair Extensions One Piece Striaght Fringe Cute Hairpiece Accessories Lady Favor
product_meta.description:
About seller:
We offer high quality hair extensions.tangle free,silky soft. 



Premium quality clip in hair extensions with hair volume to make up your head, or to add extra volume and length all over. The hairs are silky and soft, Grade A, specially selected for American market. 

100% Brand new and high quality Material: Synthetic Fiber, just clip it on hair Safety: Without any chemical dye to damage your hair & health. 

Specifications:
Professional salon quality 
Package included:1 x straight bang 
Hair Length:8" 
Application Time: 5 minutes (approx.)
Life: 6 to 12 Months (depending on care and use)

Exact Colors that are pictured might not be the same because of different monitors being used and cameras, please contact us if you have any question, we always stand behind our items

As with anything in life and unavoidable as may be, this occasionally happens. In any event, all problems can be sorted with a little communication, so please contact via Amazon messages and we will do our level best to sort out.Thx
feature_bullets: Texture: Cosplay Style hair extensions High quality, tangle free,silky soft
Easy to get a new hairstyle
